organization.title: Organization
organization.hint: Assign this room to a zone (e.g. "Ground Floor", "Upstairs") to group related rooms together.

devicesDisplays.title: Devices & Displays
devicesDisplays.summary: {devices} devices and {displays} displays are currently assigned to this space.
devicesDisplays.summaryDevicesOnly: {devices} devices are currently assigned to this space.

smartOverrides.title: Smart overrides
smartOverrides.hint: Optional settings to improve smart behavior and intent-based control.

subHeadings.list: Organize devices and displays by rooms or zones
subHeadings.onboarding: Setup wizard for spaces, devices and displays

table.empty: No spaces found. Create your first space to get started.

validation.maxLength: Name must be less than 100 characters

category.title: Category
category.hint: Choosing a category will automatically suggest an icon and description for this space. Available categories depend on whether this is a room or zone.

parentZone.title: Parent zone
parentZone.hint: You can organize this room by assigning it to a zone, like 'Ground Floor' or 'Upstairs'. This helps group related rooms together.

primaryThermostat.title: Primary thermostat
primaryThermostat.hint: Override the default thermostat selection for this space

primaryTemperatureSensor.title: Primary temperature sensor
primaryTemperatureSensor.hint: Override the temperature reading source for this space

lightingRoles.title: Lighting roles
lightingRoles.description: Assign roles to lights to help the panel understand how each light is typically used (Work, Relax, Night)
lightingRoles.noLights: No lights found in this space
lightingRoles.applyDefaultsHint: Sets first light as Main, others as Ambient

climateRoles.title: Climate roles
climateRoles.description: Assign roles to climate devices to help the panel understand how each device controls temperature and air quality
climateRoles.noDevices: No climate devices found in this space
climateRoles.applyDefaultsHint: Sets thermostat as Primary, heaters/AC as Auxiliary, fans as Ventilation

suggestionsEnabled.title: Enable suggestions
suggestionsEnabled.hint: When enabled, the panel will show non-intrusive lighting suggestions based on time of day and current state.

descriptions.main: Primary lighting for the space, typically overhead or central fixtures used for general illumination.
descriptions.task: Focused lighting for specific activities like reading, cooking, or working.
descriptions.ambient: Soft background lighting used to create atmosphere and comfort.
descriptions.accent: Decorative lighting used to highlight features or create visual interest.
descriptions.night: Low-level lighting for nighttime navigation and safety.
descriptions.other: Lighting that doesn't fit into standard categories.
descriptions.hidden: Hidden lights are excluded from the panel UI and intent-based control.

descriptions.primary: Main temperature regulation device for the space, typically the primary thermostat or HVAC controller.
descriptions.auxiliary: Secondary heating or cooling devices that supplement the primary climate control.
descriptions.ventilation: Air circulation devices like fans and air exchangers for fresh air and comfort.
descriptions.humidity_control: Humidity control devices including humidifiers and dehumidifiers.
descriptions.temperature_sensor: Temperature sensor providing ambient temperature readings for the space.
descriptions.humidity_sensor: Humidity sensor providing ambient humidity readings for the space.
descriptions.other: Climate devices that don't fit into standard categories.
descriptions.hidden: Hidden devices are excluded from the panel UI and intent-based control.

texts.noSpaces: You don't have configured any space
texts.noFilteredSpaces: No spaces match your filter criteria
texts.confirmDiscard: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

climateOverrides.title: Climate
climateOverrides.popoverDescription: These settings define which devices are used to control and measure climate in this space.

devices.title: Devices
devices.empty: No devices assigned to this space
devices.removed: Device "{name}" was removed from this space.

displays.title: Displays
displays.empty: No displays assigned to this space
displays.selectRoom: Select the room for this display
displays.removed: Display "{name}" was removed from this space.

scenes.title: Scenes
scenes.empty: No scenes assigned to this space
scenes.name: Scene name
scenes.assigned: Scene "{name}" was assigned to this space.
scenes.removed: Scene "{name}" was removed from this space.

messages.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove space "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this space?
messages.notCreated: Something went wrong. Unable to create the space.
messages.edited: Changes saved! The space: {space} has been updated.
messages.notEdited: Something went wrong. Space update was not successful.
messages.deletedWhileEditing: This space was deleted and is no longer available.
messages.createError: Failed to create space. Please try again.
messages.saveError: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
messages.confirmBulkRemove: Are you sure you want to remove {count} spaces? This action cannot be undone.
messages.bulkRemoveCanceled: Bulk space removal has been canceled.

spaces.title: Create spaces
spaces.description: Spaces help you organize your devices and displays by rooms or zones (e.g., Living Room, Kitchen, Bedroom). We've automatically detected some spaces from your device names - review and select the ones you want to create, or add your own custom spaces below.
spaces.alertTitle: Spaces represent rooms or areas in your home
spaces.alertDescription: We've suggested some spaces based on your device names. You can adjust them now or change everything later.
spaces.noProposals: No spaces could be detected from your device names. Add spaces manually below.
spaces.duplicateWarning: A space similar to "{name}" already exists.
spaces.convertedToMatch: This space matches an existing space and has been moved to the 'Using existing spaces' section.
spaces.multipleMatchedWith: {count} detected spaces will use existing space '{name}'

displays.title: Assign displays
displays.description: Assign each display to a space. This determines which space the display will show by default.
displays.alertTitle: Choose a default space for each display
displays.alertDescription: This only sets the initial view—you can switch spaces anytime from the display itself.

devices.title: Assign devices
devices.description: Assign devices to spaces. Devices will be pre-assigned based on their names if detected.
devices.alertDescription: Some devices are pre-filled based on their names. Feel free to adjust—you can always change assignments later.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Review your configuration before applying changes.
summary.alertDescription: You can still go back and adjust anything before finishing.

messages.completed: Onboarding complete! {devices} device(s), {displays} display(s), and {zones} zone assignment(s).
